name: MagBlocks
description:
ControlsMovementGrabBoostP1
Arrow keys
SpaceTabP2Left Joystick
Controller A
Controller B

Control up to two determined magnets in this physics based puzzle game!

Grab the pieces and align them with the grid. If they seem too heavy, a friend can help you; or you can also boost!

Complete several lines at the same time to earn more points and reach the top of the online leaderboards!
